name: songselect
description: Hello, this is the beginning of our song select game that will be programmed using Node.js, React-Redux, and TypeScript.

scripts.start-dev: concurrently "cd ./api && npm run start" "cd ./client && npm run start"
scripts.install-dev: npm install && concurrently "cd ./api && npm install --production=false" "cd ./client && npm install --production=false"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd ./api && npm run build" "cd ./client && npm run build"

author: Tony Tian, Simon Lee, and Ethan Yap
